title: CSE AIML
content: I saw a recent post of a senior who attended their orientation saying the management has changed the curriculum of the AIML branch to match that of the core branch and that there is a very small difference in the branches which are some small subjects and the electives that are to be taken in the 3rd which are of course pre-defined for the AIML branch. I wanted to ask if this information is true?

comments.body: Yes it's true. It's currently like that for the 2nd year's now.
